channel.title: Help With Animation revamp
channel.description:
Hi I have downloaded the animation revamp by IIopn [url]https://blackmesa.gamebanana.com/skins/download/126786[/url]
But there is no sound playing for the glock or mp5 reload sounds
Please help I made sure I added the line into the scripts folder so I don't know what I am doing wrong.

item.title: Help With Animation revamp
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
Solved **

Just had to change the “preload_file” “scripts/sound_weapon_M4.txt”

TO “preload_file” “scripts/sound_weapon_mp5.txt”

Read full topic
